Title: The Syndicate
Summary: Each series features a different group of people whose lives turn upside down after they jointly win the lottery.

Title: Colette
Summary: Colette is pushed by her husband to write novels under his name. Upon their success.she fights to make her talents known.challenging gender norms.

Title: Red Joan
Summary: The story of Joan Stanley.who was exposed as the K.G.B.'s longest-serving British spy.
